passive.name: Power Chord
passive.description:
Accelerando: Sona gains non-Ultimate ability haste permanently for her basic abilities as she uses her abilities well, up to a cap. Beyond that cap, further successful uses reduce her ultimate's remaining cooldown instead.

Power Chord: Every few spell casts, Sona's next attack will deal bonus magic damage in addition to an additional effect based on what basic Ability Sona last activated.

basic_ability_3.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Move Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Move Speed.

name: Sona
notes: Scaling coefficients are not included in Data Dragon spell vars for these files; only base values are represented.
Where leveltip labels exist, base values are mapped into effects with formula terms using base_by_rank.

formula.contextual_multipliers: Optional. Used when the result depends on context like target type.
formula.output_stat: The stat produced by this formula (e.g., magic_damage, heal, bonus_health).

terms.source: Optional. References a base array like base_by_rank or base_by_champion_level.
terms.input_stat: Optional. The stat used for scaling (e.g., ability_power, bonus_health).
coefficient_type: per_point: linear scaling per 1 point of input_stat.
percent_of_stat: input_stat * coefficient, where coefficient is a percent as a decimal.
percent_per_100_stat: coefficient applied per 100 of input_stat.
multiplier: used when the input_stat is a value to be multiplied directly (e.g., damage_dealt).

formula.op: Operation applied to all terms. Common: add, multiply.

schema_notes.base_by_champion_level: Array of base values by champion level tiers (as defined by the game).
schema_notes.value_percent: A fixed percentage value (stored as percent, not decimal).
schema_notes.base_by_rank: Array of base values by ability rank (1-5).
schema_notes.ratio_type: Defines how a ratio is interpreted relative to the specified resource or stat.
